connection
Class Tracker

java.lang.Object
  connection.Tracker

public class Tracker
extends java.lang.Object

A class for sending tracker requests and getting a response stream.

Author:
Ari & Jay

Tracker

               java.lang.String info_hash,
               java.lang.String peer_id,

Constructor

Parameters:
url - The url of the tracker
info_hash - The info hash of the torrent
peer_id - The peer_id which our client will be using
port - The port on which we are listening for incoming connections
Method Detail

request

public java.io.InputStream request(long uploaded,
                                   long downloaded,
                                   int left,
                                   java.lang.String event)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Sends a GET request to the tracker.

Parameters:
uploaded - The amount of bytes we have uploaded
downloaded - The amount of bytes we have downloaded
left - The amount of bytes we still need to finish the file
event - The value of the event String to send
Returns:
tracker response as an InputStream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on failed URL get request
